mapper.insert: insert into userList (uname, upass, uemail, uphoto, uinfo, authority, enabled) values (#{uname}, #{upass}, #{uemail},#{uphoto},null,#{authority},1)
mapper.select: select count(*) from userList where uname = #{uname}
select count(*) from userList where uemail = #{uemail}
mapper.update: update userlist set uphoto=#{uphoto} where uname=#{uname}
mapper.select: select pfname, pfdate, pfthumb, uname from portfolio where pfnum IN(select pfnum from recommend where uname = #{uname})
select u.uname, upass, uemail, uphoto, uinfo, enabled, auth from userlist u left outer join userlist_auth auth on u.uname = auth.uname where u.uemail = #{uemail}
